Articles.Content:
Ok, i just saw someone step up and make a tutorial for Milkshape of all things.. So.. does anyone know of one / want to make one for 3ds Max? :D

It would be much appreciated!

Guide is complete, if you have any questions, let me know. I\'ll get it posted to the wiki once its been reviewed for errors.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2706.0

Awesome tutorial.. It answered pretty much everything i needed to know, but there are a few problems..

1 ) I tried running the 'Get Vector Tool' script that comes with the KSP SDK, and itwill not execute...

2) I have FBX Version 2012.1 as opposed to 2012.0 (as you had in the tutorial) and there is a small difference in the options..
